experience.description: Formulated Risk Analysis framework using ML and Bayesian Statistical Models for electronics and semiconductor supply chains within North America. Worked on data discovery, imputation, pre-processing, training, and evaluation.

experience.title: Quality Assurance Specialist
experience.description: • Analyzed defect data to derive actionable insights, aiding management decisions.• Created statistical and ML models to analyze defect data, resulting in a significant reduction in defect rates by 4.32% within 6 months, saving about 150k USD in scrap cost.• Spearheaded the manufacturing quality with a team of 22 members in achieving operational excellence for two home appliance products.• Acknowledged by senior management for the swift adaptation and enhancement of quality operations.
experience.description_html: • Analyzed defect data to derive actionable insights, aiding management decisions.• Created statistical and ML models to analyze defect data, resulting in a significant reduction in defect rates by 4.32% within 6 months, saving about 150k USD in scrap cost.• Spearheaded the manufacturing quality with a team of 22 members in achieving operational excellence for two home appliance products.• Acknowledged by senior management for the swift adaptation and enhancement of quality operations.

experience.title: Data Science Intern
experience.description: • Architectured a Dialted CNN framework to estimate the gaze direction of the human eye using facial images.• Applied hyperparameter tuning, k-fold CV, data augmentation, and dropout regularisation, improving test accuracy by 5.7%.• Constructed an MLP linking stress with physiological metrics, advancing health monitoring for comprehensive assessment.• Built a 3-layer NN correlating stress levels with gaze factors, achieving a nuanced insight into stress dynamics across varied tasks.

projects: [{"title":"P.E.E.R. (Personalized Education Enhancer and Recommender)","start_date":"Jan 2024","end_date":"May 2024","description":"• Developed P.E.E.R., integrating Google Books API and Udemy API to aggregate educational resources into a unified platform.• Implemented data acquisition pipelines for 120k Google Books entries and 40k Udemy courses, utilizing Amazon AWS DynamoDB for efficient cloud storage and management.• Engineered a full-text search engine using PostgreSQL FTS with GIN indexing to optimize search and retrieval performance.• Created a recommendation engine utilizing RoBERTa for text embeddings, calculating cosine similarity to deliver personalized content suggestions.• Established a feedback system to iteratively enhance recommendation algorithms based on user interactions and preferences."},{"title":"Comparative analysis of KNN and CNN on FashionMNSIT","start_date":"Aug 2023","end_date":"Dec 2023","description":"• Implemented CNN and K-NN to classify the FashionMNSIT dataset and assessed models through precision, recall, and F1 scores.• Created a blog post detailing the classification process, featuring insights into deep learning and machine learning applications with a focus on their practical implications in the clothing industry, innovation, scalability, and trends."},{"title":"Predicting Traffic Flows using Regression Analysis","start_date":"Jul 2021","end_date":"May 2022","description":"• Designed an innovative traffic forecasting model to improve the existing Intelligent Transportation System (ITS), combining multiple ensemble regression techniques using weights and achieving 84.3% accuracy in predicting road congestion levels.• Created a user-friendly website in HTML, offering travel recommendations based on user inputs and real-time congestion data."}]
